creator: hauser@acm.org
text:
with the current documentation, it wasn't that easy to get tstamp running, it
appears that
1) if the tstamp format is set in a calling target or the default target, it  
   appears not to be available in a dependent target
2) furthermore, it would be great to have extended list of tasks/properties that
   typically benefit from tstamp formatting - so far I see the three standard
   properties TODAY, DSTAMP, TSTAMP as well as the touch task, I guess there 
   are several more...

1) <tstamp> sets properties. So having these properties in a "called" target (I
think you use <ant> or <antcall>) you have to pass them as each other property.

2) You can set additional properties using nested <format> tags.
creator: jan@materne.de
